conditions: death of life assured during the policy term
rules.action: Pay Sum Assured on Death and along with Loyalty Additions, if any, provided the policy is in-force.
rules.beneficiary: Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured

conditions: death due to suicide within 12 months from date of commencement of risk
rules.action: Pay 80% of the total premiums paid till the date of death (excluding any taxes, extra premium and rider premium, if any)
rules.beneficiary: Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured

conditions: death due to suicide within 12 months from date of revival
rules.action: Pay higher of 80% of the total premiums paid till the date of death (excluding any taxes, extra premium and rider premium, if any) or the surrender value available as on date of death
rules.beneficiary: Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured
rules.ambiguity_reason: Action is too complex/long (>150 chars). Consider splitting.

conditions: policy lapsed without acquiring paid-up value
policy is in-force and premiums have been paid for at least five full years
rules.action: Pay Death Benefit which shall not be less than 105% of total premiums paid upto the date of death
rules.beneficiary: Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured

conditions: policy is in-force and all due premiums have been paid
rules.action: Pay Sum Assured on Maturity along with Loyalty Additions
rules.beneficiary: Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured

conditions: policy can be surrendered after completion of first policy year
rules.action: Pay Surrender Value which shall be higher of Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV) and Special Surrender Value (SSV)
Pay Auto Cover Period benefits as specified in Condition 2 of Part D
rules.ambiguity_reason: Auto Cover Period duration not specified

conditions: policy loan can be availed after completion of first policy year
rules.action: Pay Loan as per terms and conditions of the policy

conditions: claim is settled within 15 days for Death Claims not requiring Investigations
rules.action: Pay claim amount as per policy terms and conditions

conditions: claim is settled within 45 days for Early Death Claims requiring investigations
rules.action: Pay claim amount as per policy terms and conditions

conditions: policy servicing request is completed within 7 days
rules.action: Complete policy servicing as per policy terms and conditions
